# Government Tender Announcement: Food Concession in Battlefields Park

**Title:** Operate a Food Concession within the Battlefields Park (Plains of Abraham)

**Reference Number:** cb-108-43180223
**Amendment Number:** 6
**Solicitation Number:** CCBN-24-P24000115

**Publication Date:** February 7, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** March 11, 2024 at 11:00 a.m. (EST)

**Contract Details:**

*   Contract Start Date: April 1, 2024
*   Contract End Date: March 31, 2029

**Purpose:** The National Battlefields Commission (NBC) invites proposals to operate a food concession within the Battlefields Park (Plains of Abraham) at the central pavilion beside the Edwin-Bélanger Bandstand. The concession will also include a mobile unit to serve locations agreed upon with the NBC.

**Scope of Work:**

*   Operate a food concession in the Battlefields Park
*   Provide food and beverage services to park visitors
*   Maintain a clean and safe environment for customers and staff
*   Comply with all relevant health and safety regulations

**Evaluation Criteria:**

*   Technical Merit (40%)
*   Price (30%)
*   Experience and Reputation (30%)

**Instructions to Bidders:**

*   Proposals must be submitted electronically via the CBC's procurement portal
*   A non-mandatory visit to the park will be held on February 20, 2024, from 10:00 a.m. to 12:00 p.m.
*   The call for proposals document and any addenda can be accessed through the CBC's procurement portal
*   All questions and concerns must be submitted to the Contracting Authority no later than March 4, 2024

**Contact Information:**

*   Philippe Lafrenière, Contracting Authority
*   Email: philippe.lafreniere@ccbn-nbc.gc.ca
*   Phone: (418) 948-2260

Note: The call for proposals document and any addenda can be accessed through the CBC's procurement portal.
